analysis.description:
RussianRoulette.finishGames (/unique_chucks/3/0x0ab2c9e20aa31fd3a3728a86f2526cca06a2b76d.sol#332-350) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- bn == block.number
r in RussianRoulette.finishGames (/unique_chucks/3/0x0ab2c9e20aa31fd3a3728a86f2526cca06a2b76d.sol#336) is a local variable never initialiazed
r in RussianRoulette.testRandom (/unique_chucks/3/0x0ab2c9e20aa31fd3a3728a86f2526cca06a2b76d.sol) is a local variable never initialiazed
r in RussianRoulette._getGameResults (/unique_chucks/3/0x0ab2c9e20aa31fd3a3728a86f2526cca06a2b76d.sol#406) is a local variable never initialiazed

Cylinder.finish has external calls inside a loop:
	- ! d.depositor.send(reward) (/unique_chucks/3/0x0ab2c9e20aa31fd3a3728a86f2526cca06a2b76d.sol#129-134)

Cylinder.withdraw has external calls inside a loop:
	- deposit.depositor.transfer(msg.value + ret) (/unique_chucks/3/0x0ab2c9e20aa31fd3a3728a86f2526cca06a2b76d.sol#184-185)

Cylinder.withdraw has external calls inside a loop:
	- SERVICE.transfer(dep - ret) (/unique_chucks/3/0x0ab2c9e20aa31fd3a3728a86f2526cca06a2b76d.sol#186-188)

RussianRoulette.fallback has external calls inside a loop:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value - bet) (/unique_chucks/3/0x0ab2c9e20aa31fd3a3728a86f2526cca06a2b76d.sol#281-282)
Parameter '_idx' of RussianRoulette.getCylinder (/unique_chucks/3/0x0ab2c9e20aa31fd3a3728a86f2526cca06a2b76d.sol#373) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_deps' of RussianRoulette._copyDeps (/unique_chucks/3/0x0ab2c9e20aa31fd3a3728a86f2526cca06a2b76d.sol#464) is not in mixedCase
